Motivational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Motivational.author: Winston Churchill

Motivational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Motivational.author: Steve Jobs

Motivational.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivational.author: Sam Levenson

Motivational.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Motivational.author: George Addair

Motivational.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

Productivity.quote: It's not always that we need to do more but rather that we need to focus on less.
Productivity.author: Nathan W. Morris

Productivity.quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
Productivity.author: Stephen King

Productivity.quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
Productivity.author: Stephen Hawking

Productivity.quote: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
Productivity.author: Peter Drucker

Humor.quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
Humor.author: Groucho Marx

Humor.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
Humor.author: Jim Carrey

Humor.quote: I am an early bird and a night owl... so I am wise and I have worms.
Humor.author: Michael Scott

Humor.quote: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
Humor.author: Steven Wright
